Public Member Functions

 CECIntTag (ec_tagname_t name, uint64 data)

Detailed Description

An integer TAG.

This is just to easily overcome ctor ambiguity. It's prettier to write CECIntTag(name, some_value) instead of CECTag(name, (uint64)value)
